meanings.sent1: The commonalities between the two paintings were evident in their use of color.
meanings.sent2: Finding commonalities among different cultures can help us understand each other better.
meanings.sent3: The commonalities between the two rival teams made them realize they were not so different after all.
meanings.sent4: The commonalities in their personalities were like pieces of a puzzle fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The commonalities in their behavior were so striking that it was hard to ignore them.
